predefinedAnswers.open ucd home page: You can open UCD home page by clicking here.
predefinedAnswers.open ucd: You can open UCD home page by clicking here.
predefinedAnswers.open install ucd agent: You can open Install UCD agent by clicking here.
predefinedAnswers.open restart ucd agent: You can open Restart UCD agent by clicking here.
predefinedAnswers.open ucd agent logs: You can open UCD agent Logs by clicking here.
predefinedAnswers.show me ucd agent logs: You can open UCD agent Logs by clicking here.
predefinedAnswers.how are you: I'm just an AI agent, that can perform only certain tasks given in the list for you!
predefinedAnswers.what can you do: I can assist with tasks like running playbooks, fetching OS details, restarting services, and more. Just type your query!
predefinedAnswers.who created you: I was created by a UCD team member to assist with some specific tasks.
predefinedAnswers.thank you: You're welcome! If you have any other task, feel free to ask.
predefinedAnswers.hello: Hello! How can I assist you today?
predefinedAnswers.hi: Hi there! How can I help you?
predefinedAnswers.hey: Hey! What can I do for you?
predefinedAnswers.aara: How are you aara, you are so cute? and your smile so cute.
predefinedAnswers.what is my name: I'm sorry, I don't know your name yet. You can tell me by saying 'my name is [your name]'.
predefinedAnswers.how to install ansible: To install Ansible, follow the official documentation here.
predefinedAnswers.how to execute hello.sh: To execute hello.sh, type 'execute hello.sh' in the chatbot.
predefinedAnswers.how to restart ucd agent: To restart the UCD agent, type 'open restart ucd agent' or follow the instructions here.
predefinedAnswers.how to view logs: To view logs, type 'show me ucd agent logs' or click here.
predefinedAnswers.what is ansible: Ansible is an open-source automation tool used for configuration management, application deployment, and task automation.
predefinedAnswers.what is ucd: UCD (UrbanCode Deploy) is a tool for automating application deployments across environments.
predefinedAnswers.how to run playbooks: To run playbooks, type commands like 'run ansible test playbook' or 'run getosdetails playbook'.
predefinedAnswers.how to create azure feature: To create an Azure feature, type 'create azure feature and story'.
predefinedAnswers.how to install software: To install software, type commands like 'install azure agent' or follow specific installation guides.
predefinedAnswers.help: Here are some things you can ask me: 'run ansible test playbook', 'execute hello.sh', 'run getosdetails playbook', or 'how to restart ucd agent'.
predefinedAnswers.i don't understand: I'm sorry, I didn't understand that. Can you try rephrasing your question or typing 'help' for a list of commands?
